metadata.title: AI Video Generator
metadata.description: Generate videos with AI models, support text-to-video, image-to-video and video-to-video.

page.title: AI Video Generator
page.description: Generate videos with AI models, support text-to-video, image-to-video and video-to-video.

generator.title: Video Generator
generator.description: Generate videos with AI models, support text-to-video, image-to-video and video-to-video.

form.prompt_placeholder: Describe the video content, such as scene, action, style, etc.
form.reference_image_placeholder: Upload a reference image for video generation
form.reference_video_placeholder: Enter the URL of the reference video
form.some_images_failed_to_upload: Image failed to upload, please delete and re-upload
form.prompt_too_long: Prompt is too long, please delete some content

generator.preview_hint: Fill in the form on the left and click "Generate Video" to create your own video.
generator.task_pending: Waiting for the model to start...
generator.task_processing: Generating... Results will appear in My Works. You can generate more videos now.
generator.max_concurrent_tasks: Maximum 5 concurrent tasks. Please wait for current tasks to complete.
